page.title: 06HOUSING IN CROSSGATES
page.content: Crossgates is mainly a residential area. There are many different types of house, the most common being the { {semi-detatched}most of which were built in the 1930's and afterwards. Many of these houses are made of{brick and have {tiled roofs.}Some of these have been extended to make larger kitchens or living rooms or even an extra bedroom. Afew{semi-detatched houses were built around 1900 and they are made of{stone}and have{slate {roofs.}Other houses made of stone with slate roofs are{terraced houses,}and a lot of these older houses have {attics.}Many of these older houses are large and convenient for family living. There are also a lot of semi-detatched and detatched{bungalows built in the 1950's so adding to the enormous variety of housing in Crossgates.
